name: Bagus Agro Pelaga Resort
address: Jl. Raya Pura Pucak Mangu, Pelaga, Kec. Petang, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80353, Indonesia
types: resort_hotel, wedding_venue, swimming_pool, event_venue, farm, hotel, lodging, sports_complex, restaurant, food, health
review 1:
We have been with a group of 15 people and it was amazing! It never felt crowded or that we disturb other people.
Gorgeous view, and super friendly and helpful staff!! Absolutely recommend Bagus Agro Pelaga
review 2: Very comfortable, clean, and great service.  The atmosphere is very beautiful because it is surrounded by lots of plants. The air feels cool and fresh in the resort area. Very wide.  Suitable for a place to find peace apart from the hustle and bustle of the city. In addition, it is suitable as a place to hold meetings or gatherings.
review 3:
Great Place for weekend getaway!
far away from the busy town
Great for those who love to be in the Nature!
lovely room with outdoor Terrace looking at the green!

Nice tidy clean room!
even after 3years the business was shutdown because of Covid Period the room was still really clean!
review 4: While visiting in Bali my girlfriend and I wanted to understand more about local Balinese culture. We spend a few nights in this Resort and it was truly a luxurious and wonderful stay. The Resort has an integrated organic farm where they produce the veggies and fruits for the restaurant. Not necessary to mention the food we tasted with this harvested product was delicious! The farm as well produces many different flowers! Our Luxury Farm Villa was one of the most luxurious places I have ever been and the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in. This resort is a quiet, relaxing and peaceful spot in an awesome location. The view from our terrace was breath taking and the nature surrounding is astonishing. While staying at Bagus Agro Pelaga we joined a few activities organize by the wonderful staff of the hotel. One morning we went to visit the near village where some of the Hotel staff are from. We had an amazing morning talking with the village people and trekking around their amazing lands. It was the most welcoming people I have ever met in Indonesia! In the afternoon we take a tour around the farm and we learnt a lot about all the farming process and the veggies and fruits. As well we take part in a coffee roasting class and later we have a wonderful coffee tasting experience. Absolutely wonderful experience. As well around the Resort there is a lot of activities to do and landmarks to see. The staff of the hotel is of this world and we felt treated as we were part of the Agro Pelaga family. Truly a wonderful experience.
review 5: The place is located in a Pelaga the north part of Badung. The resort has a very beautiful landscape and view. The staff are really friendly. Parking space a little bit tricky for car. Interior is unique with a Indonesian accessories placed on the table. Toilet is very clean. Food is good with Balinese spices but still edible for everyone.
